Package poised

Class EditAndFinaliseProject

java.lang.Object
poised.Project
poised.EditAndFinaliseProject
public abstract class EditAndFinaliseProject extends Project
Subclass that edits and sets new information attributed to a Project object from the projectList selected by the user.

It inherits attributes from the Project parent class to edit the projects total fee editProjFeeTotal, the fee paid editProjFeePaid, the deadline Project, as well as finalises the project markProjFinalisation and generates an invoice generateInvoice.

Author:
Megan Bisschoff

  • Method Details

    • editAndUpdateProjFeeTotal

      public static void editAndUpdateProjFeeTotal(Project selectedProject, List<Project> projectList) throws SQLException
      Captures, validates and sets the projFeeTotal of the selectedProject object pulled from the projectList.

      Input is requested until the user input is validated with a regex pattern and parsed to a double type. Once validated and set, the project record that matches the project number in the database is updated with the new fee total.

      Parameters:
      selectedProject - a project object selected by the user.
      projectList - a list of the current projects.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • editAndUpdateProjFeePaid

      public static void editAndUpdateProjFeePaid(Project selectedProject, List<Project> projectList) throws SQLException
      Captures, validates and sets the projFeePaid of the selectedProject object pulled from the projectList.

      Input is requested until the user input is validated with a regex pattern and parsed to a double type. Once validated and set, the project record that matches the project number in the database is updated with the new paid amount.

      Parameters:
      selectedProject - a project object selected by the user.
      projectList - a list of the current projects.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • editAndUpdateProjDeadline

      public static void editAndUpdateProjDeadline(Project selectedProject, List<Project> projectList) throws SQLException
      Captures, validates and sets the projDeadline of the selectedProject object pulled from the projectList.

      Input is requested until the user input is validated by being parsed to a LocalDate type and formatted with the DateTimeFormatter class. Once validated and set, the project record that matches the project number in the database is updated with the new deadline.

      Parameters:
      selectedProject - a project object selected by the user.
      projectList - a list of the current projects.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • markProjFinalisation

      public static void markProjFinalisation(Project selectedProject, List<Project> projectList) throws SQLException
      Captures, validates and sets the projCompletionDate and the projFinalised status to true of the selectedProject object pulled from the projectList.

      Input for the completion date is requested until the user input is validated and parsed to a LocalDate type and formatted with the DateTimeFormatter class. Once validated and set, the project record that matches the project number in the database is updated with the completion date and and finalisation status.

      Parameters:
      selectedProject - a project object selected by the user.
      projectList - a list of the current projects.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • generateInvoice

      public static void generateInvoice(Project selectedProject, List<Project> projectList)
      Generates an invoice of the selectedProject object pulled from the projectList. The outstanding fee is calculated by subtracting the projects feeTotal from the feePaid. Once calculated, a string of the customers details from the Customer subclasses toString as well as the Projects toString method is printed out with oustanding project fees.
      Parameters:
      selectedProject - a project object selected by the user.
      projectList - a list of the current projects.
